usercssData.name: [EDITED] Simplified LingQ reading page (for dark mode)
usercssData.description: This removes elements from the LingQ v5 reader that are not necessary when reading longer texts. It is assumed that the user has set the interface to dark mode and if not the progress bar might look a little strange.
usercssData.author: colinphilipjohnstone
